H0.text: what type of artist is henri matisse. Painter

H1.text: what type of artist is henri matisse. Sculptor

H2.text: what type of artist is henri matisse. Printmaker

H3.text: what type of artist is henri matisse. Collage

A4.text: He was a draughtsman, printmaker, and sculptor, but is known primarily as a painter.

A5.text: When ill health in his final years prevented him from painting, he created an important body of work in the medium of cut paper collage.
